item.title: Solr Query for Mimicking SQL IN Operator Functionality
item.author: tyler.harms@gmail.com (Tyler Harms)
item.description: I did a lot of playing around with solr to get this right. Unfortunately there is not a lot of documentation on searching within a certain field. With the SQL language you can search for multiple terms in a given field using the IN operator. In Solr you have the option of specifying a field using the qf operator, but what if you have more search terms searching other fields? The problem becomes far more complex. Given the following SQL statement how would we query Solr?
